org.intellimate.izou.addon

Interface AddOnModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ro.fortsoft.pf4j.ExtensionPoint, Identifiable

    public interface AddOnModel
extends ro.fortsoft.pf4j.ExtensionPoint, Identifiable
    All AddOns must implement this Class. It will be instantiated and its registering-methods will be called by the PluginManager. This class has method for a properties-file named addOnID.properties (AddOnsID in the form: package.class)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leander Kurscheidt

    • Method Summary
